  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14422</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Quiz fotografico sull' Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Picture Quiz Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung Quiz Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu l'Europe d'Image</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Europa Do Retrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων Ευρώπη εικόνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso Europa Del Cuadro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli allievi possono diventare esperti sulle capitali europee. Ciascuna capitale è descritta da un'immagine e da una breve frase.</string>
            <string language="en">Students can become familiar with European capitals. Each capital is decribed by a picture and a short sentence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">capitali</string>
            <string language="en">capitals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">città capitali</string>
            <string language="en">capital cities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">capitali europee</string>
            <string language="en">European capitals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können mit europäischen 
Kapitalien vertraut werden. Haupt jedes ist decribed durch eine 
Abbildung und einen kurzen Programmsatz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent se familiariser avec les 
capitaux européens. Chacun capital est decribed par une image 
et une phrase courte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem tornar-se familiares com os 
capitais europeus. Cada um importante é decribed por um retrato
e por uma sentença curta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να γίνουν εξοικειωμένοι με τα 
ευρωπαϊκά κεφάλαια. Κάθε κεφάλαιο είναι από μια εικόνα 
και μια σύντομη πρόταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden hacer familiares con los 
capitales europeos. Cada uno capital es decribed por un cuadro y
una sentencia corta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitalien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauptstädte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Kapitalien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">capitaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">villes capitales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Capitaux européens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">capitais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cidades importantas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capitais europeus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κεφάλαια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύριες πόλεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκά κεφάλαια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">capitales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciudades capitales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capitales europeos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Incoraggiare gli studenti a guardare attentamente le immagini ed a leggere le spiegazioni. L'esercizio offre una grande opportunità di aiutare i dicenti a riconoscere vedute famose in tutta Europa.</string>
            <string language="en">Encourage students to have a close look at the pictures and read the explanations carefully. The exercise offers a great chance to help students recognize famous sights all over Europe.</string>
          </description>
